title: Annuities: When They're Right and When They're Not for Your Retirement
description: When it comes to retirement planning, it's not just about saving enough money for the future but ensuring income streams are stable to last the rest of one's lifetime. Join MarketWatch's retirement reporter Alessandra Malito and Michael Finke, Retirement Income Institute Research Fellow at the Alliance for Lifetime Income, as they explore when annuities are appropriate, why they may be misunderstood and how to find the right one.
